item.title: Android intents for UPI Apps from Chrome
item.description: Open UPI apps from browser using deeplink

item.title: Deploy Hugo static site using Github Actions on Github page
item.description: If you already have static site built using Hugo, and whenever you need to update or add new post on website you have to build the site locally and push the changes to github. then you might consider using Github Action. It is free for public repository use

item.title: Hashedin University
item.description: In this article I am going to talk about my experience in Hashedin University, Which is a 2-month intensive yet fun-filled unique boot camp run every year by HashedIn Technologies. Each Week we used to get exposure of new tech stacks and we learn those technologies from scratch in the first half of the week and in the last half we used to get an assignment on that tech stack.

item.title: how to preprocess data for regression model
How to Compare Two Algorithms
item.description: Let’s understand this with a story. Alice,Bob, and john are best friends, Let’s assume Alice and Bob took a programming course this semester and john didn’t. john went to hangout with alice and bob

item.title: Hello World !
item.description: This is shubham. I created this Blog to write something that i would found helpful. If you really want to understand something, the best way is to try and explain it to someone else. That forces you to sort it out in your mind. And the more slow and dim-witted your pupil, the more you have to break things down into more and more simple ideas. And that’s really the essence of programming.
